channel.title: vaccine on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in vaccine on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-04
item.description: Samsung Galaxy A53 leak leaves little to the imagination with official-looking renders, specs (2 minute read) Details on Samsung’s upcoming Galaxy A53 have been leaked.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-01
item.description: What’s a five-letter word for “acquire”? NYT buys Wordle for “low 7 figures” (2 minute read) The New York Times has announced that it will purchase Wordle for a number in the low seven figures.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-04
item.description: Apple becomes first U.S. company to reach $3 trillion market cap (2 minute read) Apple hit a market cap of $3 trillion during intraday trading on Monday.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-31
item.description: Samsung’s leaked Galaxy S22 Ultra is just straight up a Galaxy Note now (2 minute read) A newly leaked official render of Samsung’s Galaxy S22 Ultra shows a device that is pretty much a Note in every way except for its name.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-01
item.description: Apple adds two brand new Siri voices and will no longer default to a female or male voice in iOS (3 minute read) Siri will no longer default to a female voice in English.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-10
item.description: McDonald’s confirms creation of McPlant plant-based burger, unveils new Crispy Chicken Sandwich will debut in 2021 (6 minute read) McDonald’s announced a new plant-based burger and a new Crispy Chicken Sandwich during its virtual investor update on Monday.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-03
item.description: ByteDance and Microsoft deal for TikTok to stay in the U.
